title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still visible.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be invisible.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Verify that the item is still visible when it should be invisible.
